full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I SKU'I SNANG BRNYAN GSAL BAR BYED PA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I SKU'I SNANG BRNYAN GSAL BAR BYED PA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DRAG KHA THEG CHENG GLING GI 'DU KHANG LOGS BRIS SKABS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS PAD TSAL DGE SLONG RIN PO CHES BSKUL ZHING, PIR THOGS DBANG PO SNAR THANG PA BLO BZANG 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS KYANG 'DI LTAR YI GEER 'KHOD PA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA CHUNG DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO KUN NAS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,
